Turn Happy Customers into 5-Star Google Reviews

Most businesses lose out because satisfied customers stay silent. RatingsBoost changes that. Our automated system catches your happiest clients at the right moment, makes it effortless for them to leave a review, and sends those 5-star ratings straight to Google. The result? A stronger reputation, more trust, and more leads—without extra work for your team.

Easy Set-Up & Operation

Takes less than 10 minutes to get started—fully automated emails & SMS work in the background.

More Stars, More Revenue

1 extra star can mean +13% more clicks & +18% more revenue (Harvard Business Review benchmark).

Intelligent Customer Outreach

Smart timing and reminder limits built-in so clients never feel spammed.

Works With Any System

Upload email lists, connect POS/CRM via Zapier, or offer one-tap QR codes at checkout.

Fully Compliant

Top-level security & privacy, compliant with Google T&C.

No Payment Needed to Begin

Cancel in the first 90 days and pay nothing.
